title: Banyan The Resort Hua Hin Awarded with the Best Golf Resort 2016 by IAGTO - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Banyan The Resort Hua Hin Awarded with the Best Golf Resort 2016 by IAGTO  
The management and staff of Banyan The Resort Hua Hin represented by Sirirat Murphy (Ms.), General Manager, is pleased to announce that the resort has just been honored with the coveted prize of the ‘Best Golf Resort 2016’ in the Rest of the World category by the International Association of Golf Tour Operators (IAGTO) at the Annual IAGTO Awards ceremony extravaganza at Siam Park, Tenerife, Spain on the final night of the International Golf Travel Mart.
 
“We are extremely honored to have received this coveted award from the esteemed organization, IAGTO, through the members’ vote, solidifying our intention of providing only the best services and outstanding facilities at both our resort and golf course to our discerning clients,” said Ms. Murphy.
 
Banyan The Resort Hua Hin was voted by specialist golf tour operator members of IAGTO encompassing 556 from 62 different countries in the world including Thailand, for what they considered to be the best-performing golf resort of the year on the following criteria: customer satisfaction; quality of golf courses and accommodation; value for money; support from suppliers; tourist boards & airlines; professional conduct of suppliers; and accessibility to tee times.
Set in a beautiful landscaped environment and complemented by world-class facilities, Banyan The Resort Hua Hin comprises luxurious one and two bedroom pool villas, overlooking tropical gardens and infinite swimming pools, recreation, spa and fitness facilities and award-winning dining venues offering Thai and international cuisine. Recently awarded the Certificate of Excellence by Trip Advisor, the world’s leading travel review website, the resort is the preferred choice of discerning local and international clients looking for a relaxing getaway.
 
 
Source:- IAGTO
